name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Model File
summary: An OGF file is a 3D model used by S.T.A.L.K.E.R. first-person shooter games. It contains 3D meshes and animation data. OGF files are used for game models such as characters, weapons, terrain, and environmental objects.
